meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing a cyclic ester group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the structure of lactones in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Dairy products may contain lactones that contribute to their flavor.
meanings.sent3: The lactones in the organic compound were having a party in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry bloomed like lactones in a flower.
meanings.sent5: The cyclic ester group of lactones resembled a tiny carousel under the microscope.

meanings.definition: A type of compound commonly found in dairy products.
meanings.sent1: The chef used lactones to enhance the taste of the cheese.
meanings.sent2: Lactones give milk and butter their characteristic flavors.
meanings.sent3: The lactones in the dairy aisle were gossiping about the yogurt.
meanings.sent4: Her smile spread through the room like the aroma of lactones.
meanings.sent5: The creamy texture of the ice cream was like a hug from lactones.
